attributes.title: Need a cat sweater?
attributes.review: I downloaded this app about a month ago. At first I noted the awful graphics, design, and content, but that was before things got weird. The app updated but would not reinstall. For weeks it was “loading.” I could not access it or remove it from my phone. Less than 24 hours after the app shut down I began receiving amazon packages that were ordered from my account. Although I hadn’t ordered anything besides a hat with grapefruits on it for a while, boxes upon boxes arrived at my doorstep all filled with MAGA cat sweaters. I do not even have a cat. It got worse. As the days went on, my lock screen was replace with moronic Trump quotes and the photos of me in my photo library suddenly appeared like I was head to toe in MAGA merchandise. Even my dog was wearing one of those awful cat sweaters. I am very uncomfortable with the havoc that this app has caused over the past few weeks. I do not know how to solve this issue, but I can assure I haven’t had any trouble like this with Democratic campaign apps. If anyone needs a cat sweater I would be happy to ship it to you.

attributes.title: horrid
attributes.review: i was expecting to see our president but instead i was greeted by a fat orange with tiny hands 🤢😭😖 however when i saw the fat orange i almost pulled a hanna baker 🤢🥺 he would have been all 13 reasons why! 💕 i screamed bc i was in total shock by seeing such a vial creature that my great grandparents came back to life!!! we are now on our way to go beat the ugly orange 🍊 into a pulp if you would like to join hmu!!!!! 💕💕💕💕💕💕

attributes.title: This app is trash 🗑
attributes.review: With everything going on plus elections I wanted to educate myself but this app was just not the one. The app is super glitchy. Gives me android vibes✨👾 my phone started to glitch too after I downloaded it🙄 I kept turning it off to see if it would fix it but it just simply did not work. My phone is brand new too I’ve barley had at for 3 months plus it’s the 11 so don’t try to play me😤 when I realized that the app wasn’t going to work I decided to delete it but when I tried my phone glitched AGAIN I had to turn it off and wait to delete it. It was some fbi shi istg. My phone of back to normal thank god cuz I girl on a budget😗

attributes.title: Killed my dog 🤬🤬
attributes.review: I opened this app ONCE! and my dog immediately keeled over and died. The vet said it was from brain rot, but that doesn’t make sense because all I watch on TV is fox news!! I used to be a ✨trump supporter✨ but now the cheeto man has killed my dog 🟠🥊😡 The audio is terrible and cuts out randomly and the screen always freezes 🥶 Horrible app! The worst! The worst in America! The worst in the world! I have a better app! Anyways, rest in piece fluffy 2016-2020 😔🙏🐕 gone but never forgotten 💕

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: after i got this app roaches started crawling out of my phone! every time i opened the app, there was a video message from trump telling me about his piss kink. TMI!!! i’d give negative stars if i could. absolutely horrible.
